scripts.lint: npm run compile && ./bin/coffeelint -f coffeelint.json src/*.coffee test/*.coffee test/*.litcoffee
scripts.lint-csv: npm run compile && ./bin/coffeelint --csv -f coffeelint.json src/*.coffee test/*.coffee
scripts.lint-jslint: npm run compile && ./bin/coffeelint --jslint -f coffeelint.json src/*.coffee test/*.coffee
scripts.compile: coffee -c -o lib src && ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -t coffeeify -s coffeelint -e  src/coffeelint.coffee > lib/coffeelint.js
